title: Mobile Microlearning Program for Strengthening Statistical Concept Interpretation Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding Basic Statistical Terms (Mean, Variance, Standard Deviation, etc.) and Experience Applying Statistics in Psychology
context.additional_context: Integration of learner-specific mobile device utilization with real-time feedback systems

learning_goals: Learners accurately interpret provided statistical graphs (e.g., histograms, scatter plots) and explain them in research contexts
Learners derive research conclusions and analyze limitations based on hypothesis testing results (p-value, confidence intervals)
Learners complete 80%+ of 10 microlearning modules designed per Merrill’s instructional design principles and achieve ≥70/100 in post-assessments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
